id.comment: select all statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s

id.comment: select all read

query.querystr: read r; Select r

id.comment: select all variable

query.querystr: variable v; Select v

id.comment: select all constant

query.querystr: constant c; Select c

id.comment: select all print

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn

id.comment: select all while

query.querystr: while w; Select w

id.comment: select all if

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs

id.comment: select all assign

query.querystr: assign a; Select a

id.comment: check if statement is parent of statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(8, 9)

id.comment: check if statement is parent of statement that does not exist

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(8, 10)

id.comment: select parent of 1 statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s, 8)

id.comment: select direct children of 1 statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(5, s)

id.comment: select parents of 1 statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(s, 15)

id.comment: select all children of 1 statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(5, s)

id.comment: select all children of another statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(9, s)

id.comment: select statements which are parent* of itself

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(s, s)

id.comment: select statement that a statement follows

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s, 3)

id.comment: select statement that a statement follows but does not exist

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s, 1)

id.comment: select another statement that a statement follows but does not exist

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s, 9)

id.comment: select statement follows a statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(9, s)

id.comment: select statement follows a statement that does not exist

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(14, s)

id.comment: select assign that follows a statement

query.querystr: stmt s; assign a; Select a such that Follows(s, a)

id.comment: select all statements follows a statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(10, s)

id.comment: select statements that a statement follows*

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, 17)

id.comment: select statements that use a certain variable

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Uses (s, "var1234")

id.comment: select variables that a certain statement uses

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses (5, v)

id.comment: select variables that another statement uses

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses (9, v)

id.comment: select variables that another statement uses

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses (14, v)

id.comment: select statements that modify a certain variable

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Modifies (s, "zy")

id.comment: select variables that a statement modifies

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies (5, v)

id.comment: select variables that another statement modifies

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies (11, v)

id.comment: select statements with pattern

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_,_"else"_)

id.comment: select statements with pattern that does not exist

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_,_"else")

id.comment: select uses and pattern

query.querystr: assign a, a1; variable v; Select a such that Uses (a, v) pattern a1(v,_"x"_)

id.comment: select modifies and pattern

query.querystr: stmt s; assign a1; variable v; Select s such that Modifies (s, v) pattern a1(v,_"call"_)

id.comment: select assignment statements that uses itself and

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Uses (a, v) pattern a(v,_"zy"_)

id.comment: select assignment statements that uses itself

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Uses (a, v) pattern a(v,_)
